title: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, the expected behavior is that a menu should pop up to allow adding breakpoints or marks. However, in the Photon version, this popup menu does not appear.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler
The expected popup menu to add breakpoints or marks does not appear.
EB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, a popup menu should appear to allow adding breakpoints or marks.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler
Observe that the expected popup menu to add breakpoints or marks does not appear.
